headline: Broadridge and WealthFeed Partner to Offer End-to-End Advisor Lead Generation and Intelligent Nurturing
summary: Broadridge Financial Solutions Inc. (NYSE: BR), a global Fintech leader, today announced a new strategic partnership and minority investment in WealthFeed, a leading cloud-based platform that leverages AI capabilities to power lead generation and deepen existing relationships for financial advisors. The partnership brings together WealthFeed's AI prospecting and real-time money-in-motion insights with Broadridge's market-leading AdvisorStream marketing platform, helping advisors find, educate an

headline: Broadridge Successfully Delivers ISO 20022 Cash Messaging Capabilities for its Post-Trade Clients
summary: Global Fintech leader, Broadridge Financial Solutions, Inc. (NYSE: BR), today announced that it has delivered full ISO 20022 cash processing capabilities for its global bank and broker/dealer clients. This positions clients well ahead of the November 2025 Swift Standard Release.
